message.body: Echo_Mask is now live! Streaming I Wanna Be the Guy: Delicious Level Design Contest - Day 1
lol when did this game come out
yea u kinda lost during secret santa
you participated in this I assume?
That could be interesting, but a bit tedious if you have to toggle it off and on again everytime
the makers are revealed when you clear a stage
all the fun facts are true
Checking in only to say good luck! Not watching because I will play it myself some time soon so have fun! See ya around :3
bro is just dying from the production value
I like the cursed mario party 8 host voice
the pepper is difficulty I assume?
is this game trying to teach me something? fuck this game
this is missing at least one tutorial screen lol
I think your solution is probably easier than what seems to be intended
actually I guess it's pretty similar
I think when you're on the ledge, you're intended to vine jump in the hole up there and double jump to do a 16px above the yellow block
maybe I'm wrong actually because there's an extra gap near the water
never too late to go on the revised version...
Enjoying the stream? Check out my youtube channel for more / edited content:   https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCMWAZIM1egHPIou-FuCYPBg
omg echo hi, hows the dldc?
did you know about coconut water
if you told me this was dldc i wouldnt believe you
I got told about how you recognized my art just from the loading screen alone which I found insanely flattering, thank you <3
i knew it was your art when i saw it too lmao
you have a distinct art style
That means a lot to hear, I'll keep at it in the future
Good luck with the game echo, I hope you have fun with it. And btw @Egg_Zauce I'm on the last screen of your secret, pretty dope stuff
the judges didn't understand my vision

not really a spoiler, but the dumbest thing I've seen a judge say is basically "Having the player hold one key to walk one direction is more interesting than simple platforming", though it's pretty normal for judges of these contests to sometimes have the worse takes
all the other criticism is 100% reasonable, but that comment pissed me off
if this is the type of shit i'm gonna have to do, idk if i'm gonna make it boss
Its an interesting restriction that is hard to design around where as simple platforming is very nothing burger
the criticism is that "nothing burger is better than nothing burger" which is dumb, it's a nothing statement
I would have to see the context of the situation
I don't think i did a good job with my stage personally, but i had fun making it
The forced right hold stages in the across the rainbow guys games were more interesting for it
if i play more of this game, i might just outright ignore reviews
is the revamped version done by the judges then?
mostly handled by me and nat
Enjoying the stream? Join the discord to have a chat on days I am not streaming:   https://discord.gg/UsXjRQU
"How would they nerf this" by making it easier
i used this exact gimmick in my floor game
i think i can guess the maker based on the aesthetics, i wont say though
based corner pieces, wont forget the pillar though....
this stage uses this gimmick way better than i have did
speaking of good needle though, i got something cooking
omg how long is this stage lord
really really hard unnerfed stage so good on that
yeah this was defo quite a bit harder than what we had intended to receive
Enjoying the stream? Check out my youtube channel for more / edited content:   https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCMWAZIM1egHPIou-FuCYPBg
joining now is funny to hear something i havenâ€™t seen described in words alone
idk if you saw but there's a patch
you can go back to the title screen and it'll tell you if there's an update
this seems like a difficulty spike even with the nerfs lmao
okay i see, i thought you'd get stuck in the ceiling nvm
alright im going back to playing dldc, have fun

yeah i think it's important to have options above all else, defo understand some will want to play something a bit more streamlined while some will want to see the stage for what it is and what the reviews line up with
i observed with nanc2 the judges were talking about things that weren't relevant to the versions of the stages that were in the game
Enjoying the stream? Join the discord to have a chat on days I am not streaming:   https://discord.gg/UsXjRQU
yeah i think that's always the best way to handle it
I have really been enjoying your streams,  glad I came back to watching more twitch.
Cyber_Kun subscribed with Prime. They've subscribed for 14 months! I keep forgetting to resub
God I love the reflection effect
blud is the true end boss
the boss might die of exhaustion
it will if echo does nothing
I assume that the pepper is difficulty and the clock length
I didn't see it when I was using the engine
but I used base version, not DLCLCLCL
this feels one step away from an IWM Burst block map
Imma just watch the playthroughs of everyone else. I'm too washed for this shit.
@racic my goat is never washed,  good to see you around arypieSmile

Decided I was gunna start with my own stage to see the feedback, started playing it, realized it is WAY worse than I remembered, got stuck on MY OWN BOSS, and then just shut 'er down and now I'm sulking like a child.
I can feel the struggle echomask is going though
it's bad when I feel like I could play better on a stage, cuz I'm garbage
it looks like you are letting go of jump and then dashing
then it might actually just be kinda jank
not in a funny way, but an actual jank way
Enjoying the stream? Check out my youtube channel for more / edited content:   https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCMWAZIM1egHPIou-FuCYPBg
hi echo i am raiding you and then not watching because dldc spoilers glhf kbye
hi echo i am not raiding you and am watching because idc about spoilers
wdym youve been streaming for 4 hours and didnt tell us :C
how many stages deep are ya
this is gonna be a long game
yeah this stage is crazy hard
feel free to prove me wrong bro
I watched from the phone but the screens looked pretty similar overall
i never thought sonic and mega man would fit so well together
and a little but of sonic
oh and kirby too thats true
these cycles make little sense to me, I don't understand how you're supposed to time that

Cheer10 Hello Echo_Mask. I wanna play a game. I've infected your computer with needle malware. To your left is a room containing nothing but 30 chickens, and to your right is a very well made 95 difficulty gimmick needle screen. You have one week to beat one of these or your computer will explode. Face your fears, or suffer eternally. It's your choice... muahahahaha (with love, jigsaw, your caring friendly neighbor from the hit "saw" series of films, by the way cool garden gnomes).
ok the stickers on the board are cool

Cheer10 I think there's been a mistake. Thanks to Jigsaw's incompetence, it seems my computer has been struck with the needle virus instead. It has left me with a folder of 1000 needles games that are of varying quality (mostly mediocre). I well be seeking out compensation for the mental damages caused by doing the same 5 jumps over and over again with little variety. I will be suing you EchoMask even though it is Jigsaw's fault. (With Love, Jeff, your mortal enemy. Btw, fuck ur garden gnomes)
my actions are without consequence! yippiee!!!!!!!
I think you're starting at the literal worst cycle to be fair
this stage was reeeally hard to tweak
but trust me the mechanical change on the flame shield makes a huuuuge difference
erm just add a ladder that lets you climb to the end
teleporter entrance boom teleporter exit boom

Cheer10 Hello Echo_mask, sorry to bother you, but my name is timmy, can you please play my level? I worked very hard on it and had a lot of fun making it but it seems the judges did not appreciate me spamming koopas and goombas but i did that because i like mario and thought it was super fun. i think you will find it fun too because i know you like mario. watch out for bowser because he will try to kidnap your friends like he does with princess peach but i honestly think princess peach enjoys it
Enjoying the stream? Join the discord to have a chat on days I am not streaming:   https://discord.gg/UsXjRQU
thats an insane skip you just did LMAO
These reviews are going to be brutal

Cheer10 one of the judge's plane flight crashed into big spike island, so instead I, AVGN, will be replacing them for the review of this stage. I think this stage is TRASH. Like seriously, what were they thinking? Bullshit cycles that add nothing, a gimmick that doesn't even work correctly? What's up with this fucking enemy spam too, it's fucking ASS!  I'd rather chug a bottle of old man gus' piss than have to play another second of this god awful abomination. i rate FUCKIN HORSE SHIT outta 10
Let's not be too mean to the people involved
It's a decent idea done rough
We all tried our best. racicThumbs
nah this stage is cool, just a little too much
The starry ones like the one to the left feel so out of place though
what was the time limitation for this btw?
ppl had a month to make and submit stages
everytime i enter a contest, i always end up submitting garbage even though i've very capable of making good things lmao
at this point it's a bit

Doing anything at all with gimmicks was sooooo different from my usual stuff, so my stage was pretty low ranked, and I agree with absolutely everything the judges said. I've sent them messages explaining what I'd have done different and such.
what was the shield doing beforehand?
I best described my stage in one sentence: Some fun and cool stuff buried in a pile of dogshit. LUL
i just love the concept of this game's existence
So if this wins any awards, I'm assuming that all 34 stage makers + all the DLDC devs will all be invited on stage, yes? CaitThinking
nah get everyone in the call
one of the people behind make a good mega man level
yeah i tried not to change the design toooo much as to not alter vision too much but that's fair
the volleyball bounce sound is getting to me lol
nat did the nerfs for this one
the skips were there in the original version
ye skull did bit's nerfs ye
yeaah that screen is reeeally hard
i see you have also beaten bit's original stage
viktor0lsson subscribed at Tier 1. They've subscribed for 4 months! the free notification every month is very nice.
well yeah but like also you do kinda have to design around it ykno

in retrospect i do feel like it would have been better for the revised flame shield to be how it was from the start. we copied the behaviour directly from sonic but it just isn't very helpful in this context
this stage would completely filter me sadly, no 100% for me
regardless it still is very strict and hard
Were makers allowed to edit the given gimmicks themselve?
yeah you had the freedom provided you duplicated it
as long as you gave it your own naming conventions, to not conflict with engine standards/defaults, anything was fair game
thank god it dont got that in it
you would not believe the amount of ties that are in this game
Cheer10 i dont have anyhting to say

Cheer60  actuaally i just realized i do have something to say sorry. everyone should go watch markiplier's new movie ironlung because it is in theatres and it is probably awesome idk i havent watched it yet but im going to because i like markiplier, it'll probably be intersubjectively better than the fnaf2 movie fuck scott, love markiplier
you wont catch me reading the tiny book
bounce was extra on sale that day
the tilesets are okay but the super streched out stuff is unfortunate
how hard it is compared to the original?
now i know things about coconuts
actually I changed my mind a bit on the tileset, there's a lot going on
Enjoying the stream? Check out my youtube channel for more / edited content:   https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCMWAZIM1egHPIou-FuCYPBg
nah i made this i made every stage in this game
so how has this game been so far
forgot the sign on this one
the theme of this stage is seeing (lack thereof)
this is some peak needle design
GG! thanks for playing! sorry about the visuals :P
i broke it multiple times in testing instead
sounds like a normal nal thing to do
they still managed to add a fatal error on release i swear to god
i was probably a bit rude dont mind me
i still managed to savelock in the bubble stage but ipecac said it was already fixed with the update
marc is gonna be the joker of this game
marc is so strict with his scores lmao
yeah i didn't get the shotgun thing either
maker! i hardly know her! HAAAAAAAAH
idk if i should keep watching this or play this blind himura67Think
isn't the streched platform from the engine itself?
fair enough but I assume it could be the same
also i assume people from the dev team are there: why cant i stretch the game window and why is the resolution on halfscreen fullscreen so weird? lol

@HimuraChiya i take no responsibility on screen resolution testing
yes i only have 1 monitor i cant play fullscreen and stream this BabyRage
did you mean to skip a stage in the beach?
ok i guess ill not watch to see this stuff myself later
this is very stupid in funny ways
It seemed to be pretty well designed gameplay-wise from what I could see
I agree with the comments on the visuals though
ppl just chose spots whenever they wanted and whenever they came up with dialogue for it
because you told me i could[
yeah i always fully explored the next area when i finally cleared the previous one
i'm happy you like it so much, we worked real hard on it
you're half-meant to start on town as those are the lower placed levels, beach is after both town and hotel, but honestly the order is entirely up to you
oh great the game froze again
dw i'll be able to call it out at the end :)
Enjoying the stream? Check out my youtube channel for more / edited content:   https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCMWAZIM1egHPIou-FuCYPBg
i appreciate the kind words a lot, really really nice to hear for the whole team
@Natsunya_ yeah, i just talked crap the whole time so it's the first time they got to experience it
thats not true, he talked crap on void stranger too
you can ban me in a lot of places
someone said i had low testosterone earlier for not doing all items end is nigh deathless, your threats can't stop me
sorry i missed all that, all i heard was burgers which i like
I broke the game and I'm pretty sure that I'm softlocked in [SPOILER REMOVED] stage. LUL
Posted in the bug channel, but leave it to me to do some shit like that. LUL
im squelching so hard right now

Cheer500 Hey i lost my keys in this maze can you go find it? I cannot enter my home but im too squelched out of my gords to do anything about it and also i have to go so i cannot venture further into this squelchy environment. thanks and be sure not to jelq too hard or you wont squelch far

yeeeah. it's interesting for sure though
have you tried using the backflip button to go faster?
sry did you say you wanted a tip? didnt quite hear
try landing on top of the kid
genuinely. the guy joined the stage like a few days after the submissions opened
i think it was submitted like not long after submissions opened
like an hour or two after he joined. he sent the dldc needle
Terrified to see what people think of my stage FeelsPumpkinMan
heyo, I was watching during my break at work. didnt expect you be still going lol
if he gave himself like. any time at all LOL it would have been better
Should have made it the 100 diaglog boxes of barking
it takes you to any stage yeah
This hub is honestly just insane
hows the gaming going? do you adore it as much as i do
i havent played a single stage ive disliked, which is wild considering i started with the bottom five stages
yeah i do know where it is
my reviews may  or may not imply otherwise but i honestly don't think this game has any true duds
echo r u going in order?
even last place is just underbaked imo
i hope everyon enjoys my stage ðŸ˜€
i know you have no backseating rule but i can lend a hand if youd like
I think I am a knower
i was genuinely astonished to see the second to last ranked stage was this fun
have you found your own stage yet btw? just curious
i may or may not agree
i just guessed on stream and was fully expecting to not be right because i know like nothing about weezer
yeah itd be a spoiler moment
my solution was just to ask someone where it is so i didnt have to turn off secret mode
I don't think that's a meme? The music is, but the dance itself is just a thing from the source material
it was a big meme on tiktok for a bit to have a 3d dancing rat with that specific gif but yea i can understand it's kinda fine on its own terms
specific song i mean not gif
you can think that and its fine, i rather actively disliked spending my time playing it tho because of what i talked about
Enjoying the stream? Check out my youtube channel for more / edited content:   https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCMWAZIM1egHPIou-FuCYPBg
It's an old multiplayer platformer with emphasis on coop in most game modes
I think it still has server running on steam
I remember from what little I've played of transformice that game was either completely broken or the controls were broken or it was so unintuitive I've never managed to figure out how to do anything

my experience with it was like join a lobby, wonder what I'm supposed to do, fall down multiple times while trying to comprehend where I'm even at and where I'm supposed to be going, and then after getting no help form anyone just quitting

I think the gameplay loop is pretty easy to understand, get the cheese in the level, and return to the mice hole with it to win, but one of the main gameplay aspect was the wallclimb mechanic which is pretty unintuitive to learn
afters23QuestionMark  I think the bubble areas kill you instantly without the shield
i love this camera so much
